typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Column_1 as integer,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipLines: 1) ~> source1
source1 filter(Column_4>50) ~> DataFilter
DataFilter sink(input(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> sink1
